spell.irons_spellbooks.hiken.guide: Strike with a powerful fire fist burning everything in the way.
spell.irons_spellbooks.hibashira.guide: Summon a fire pilar to burn and hurt your enemies.
spell.irons_spellbooks.ice_chamber.guide: Shoot a freezing ray that will freeze an area around the impact and sometimes even the enemy itself.
spell.irons_spellbooks.ice_age.guide: Freeze everything around you, covering the world in ice.
spell.irons_spellbooks.megido.guide: Summon the wrath of the heavens, striking with lightnings every entity that dares to come around.
spell.irons_spellbooks.flower_spell.guid: Summons a cool flower hat that heals the entity over time.
spell.irons_spellbooks.paw_spell.guide: If you don't target any entity, you will launch a paw forward. If you target an entity, you heal it up and summon a paw upwards to smash the ground with the same damage as the amount healed.
spell.irons_spellbooks.end_mayhem.guide: This spell allows you to become the ruler of the end while casting it, allowing you to use the full power of the end dimension to kill your target.
spell.irons_spellbooks.holy_flag.guide: Summon the Holy Flag worn by Jeanne D'Arc to empower your allies and punish your enemies. While the flag is active, holy power is boosted and blood power is nerfed.
